title: What Am I Talking About?
description:
Today we'll explore the concept of 'Economic Accelerationism', which looks to turn the tables on how we view economic growth. 
By 'flipping the script,' we investigate how a shift in economic strategies and policies could catalyse unprecedented growth and equality.
